bpp/descriptor.name: Zeitgeist Retail
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: The ZEPP platform enables you to buy products directly from India's Top brands at specially discounted prices. The platform redirects your orders to the respective brand, who will deliver your product directly to your home, without any intermediaries. This ensures that you get the freshest products, at the best prices.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Zeitgeist Retail Private Limited (ZRPL) is an E-Commerce Technology and Services company, headquartered in Bengaluru, India.ZEPP,  the company's flagship product is an E-Commerce as a Service platform. ZEPP is now integrated through API’s with several vendors and operates Employee Purchase Programs for some of India’s largest companies as well as Student Purchase Programs for India’s premier Educational Institutions. ZEPP also partners with companies like R&R service providers, to expand its reach to Consumers. As on date ZEPP offers 100+ Brands to 2M+ Consumers.

descriptor.name: Ifrogz Audio- Ear pollution plugz mobile with mike-Blue
descriptor.short_desc: Robust: The Plugz nestle in your ear and deliver stunning high-definition sound that's perfect for all types of music...Connectivity Technology: Wired Comfortable: With three sizes of soft ear tips available, you can choose the ones that are best for your hours of rocking out. Flexible: Don't worry about getting caught in your cord anymore; 1.25- meters of length let your dance without worry. Stylish: Available in a wide variety of colors, you can have a pair of Plugz for all your favorite styles.

descriptor.name: Ifrogz Audio Intone with mic-Black
descriptor.short_desc: Portable: A unique foldable design offers convenient portability and reduced risk of damage to the Intones while traveling.Connectivity Technology: Wired Stylish: With their bright color options, the InTone headphones are a perfect addition to any style. Convenient: An in-line, single-button remote/microphone allows users to control their music with ease and even take calls on the go. Comfortable: Soft, noise-isolating ear pads provide maximum comfort and enhanced sound performance.  Use DISCOUNT2UPI to get an additional 2% off, when paying by UPI
